name: web-p2

scripts.build: npm run delete && npm run deletefolder && npm run createfolder && npm run createfolder2 && npm run minifier && npm run copymedia && npm run cssmini && npm run cssmini-normalize && npm run jsmini1 && npm run jsmini2 && npm run jsmini3 && npm run copyfonts && npm run checklinks
scripts.cssmini-normalize: html-minifier --input-dir src\css --output-dir dist\css --file-ext css --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true --minify-css true
scripts.minifier: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir dist --file-ext html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true --minify-css true
